title: [Bug Report] WYSIWYG Editor 食晒啲 leading spaces

replies.msg:
Step to reproduce:
1) 喺空白嘅 editor 度打幾個空格
2) copy 佢地
3) 原地 paste

Expected result:
1) paste 返啲空格出黎

Actual result:
1) 啲空格唔見晒

Environment:
macOS Mojave 10.14.1
Chrome Version 72.0.3626.109 (Official Build) (64-bit)

Affected use cases:
1) 貼 code 會無晒 indentations
